ayah: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
ayah_translit: muttakiina ala sururin masfufatin wazawwajnahum bihurin inin
ayah_english: Reclining on thrones lined up and We will marry them to fair ones with large eyes

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina amanu wa-ittaba'athum dhurriyyatuhum biimanin alhaqna bihim dhurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min amalihim min shayin kullu im'ri-in bima kasaba rahinun
ayah_english: And those who believed and followed them their offspring in faith We will join with them their offspring and not We will deprive them of their deeds (in) any thing Every person for what he earned (is) pledged

ayah_translit: am lahum ilahun ghayru al-lahi sub'hana al-lahi amma yush'rikuna

ayah: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
ayah_translit: wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina al-samai saqitan yaqulu sahabun markumun
ayah_english: And if they were to see a portion from the sky falling they will say Clouds heaped up

ayah: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ
ayah_translit: fadharhum hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi fihi yus'aquna
ayah_english: So leave them until they meet their Day which in it they will faint

ayah: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: yawma la yugh'ni anhum kayduhum shayan wala hum yunsaruna
ayah_english: (The) Day not will avail to them their plotting (in) anything and not they will be helped

ayah: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inna lilladhina zalamu adhaban duna dhalika walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And indeed for those who do wrong (is) a punishment before that but most of them (do) not know

ayah: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
ayah_translit: wa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika fa-innaka bi-a'yunina wasabbih bihamdi rabbika hina taqumu
ayah_english: So be patient for (the) Command (of) your Lord for indeed you (are) in Our Eyes And glorify (the) praise (of) your Lord when you arise

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
ayah_translit: wamina al-layli fasabbih'hu wa-id'bara al-nujumi
ayah_english: And of the night glorify Him and after the stars
